description:
The requirements for a request for update from another Catena-X Partner of a specific entity.
If within the payload, no specific object type is defined (Payload empty), than an update of all objects within the sender reciever relation is requested).

UuidV4Trait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

Timestamp.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

MaterialDemandEntity.description: Encapsulates the information that is necessary for an update request.

materialDemandId.description: The Material Demand ID uniquely identifies the material demand the supplier requests an update for within the business relationship between the customer and its supplier.

changedAt.description: Point in time of the last update known to the requesting business partner. If the requested entity has been changed more recently, the requested party should resend the data. If the changedAt property is not given, the latest entity should be send without precondition.

MaterialDemandCharacteristic.description: A list of material demand UUIDs without duplicates an update is requested for.

WeekBasedCapacityGroupEntity.description: Encapsulates the information that is necessary for an update request.

capacityGroupId.description: The Capacity Group ID uniquely identifies the capacity group the supplier requests an update for within the business relationship between the supplier and its customer.

changedAt.description: Point in time of the last update known to the requesting business partner. If the requested entity has been changed more recently, the requested party should resend the data. If the changedAt property is not given, the latest entity should be send without precondition.

WeekBasedCapacityGroupCharacteristic.description: A list of capacity group UUIDs without duplicates an update is requested for.

materialDemand.description:
Material demands the supplier requests an update for.
If within the array, no specific ID (array empty), than an update of all IDs is requested).

weekBasedCapacityGroup.description:
Capacity groups the customer requests an update for.
If within the array, no specific ID (array empty), than an update of all IDs is requested).
